attributes.action: Prevent salons and tattooists from closing due to rate of infection
attributes.additional_details:
Help the hair and beauty industry aswel as tattooists to remain open. As the financial help in offer is not enough to keep us all going

We follow all the safe guidelines to ensure we can carry out all services safely so I feel as though we should be able to remain open 
We need to save our local businesses
attributes.background: Let us carry on working as we work in a safe environment

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Allow Salons and Tattoo parlors to open at same time as hairdressers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320507

More financial support for Hair & Beauty sector
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554500

Do not require salons to close due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408
